ExpandParameter.name: expand
ExpandParameter.description: A comma separated list of properties to expand.

LimitParameter.name: limit
LimitParameter.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Default is 10.

asset_type.description: The asset type. One of Cmdty, Corp, Ccy, Eqty, Govt, Index, Crypto.

id.description: Unique identifer for the object. ISO 4217 number for currencies.

message.description: Human readable description of the error.

field.description: The field the error corresponds to.

code.description: One of additional_field, missing_field, missing_body, invalid.

asset_type.description: The asset type. One of Cmdty, Corp, Ccy, Eqty, Govt, Index, Crypto.

cl_order_id.description: Request identifier assigned by the client (Max 48 characters).

market.description: Market to place the order against.

price_tolerance.description: Order price tolerance in absolute terms.

qty.description: Order quantity. MUST be greater than zero.

side.description: The order side. Buy or Sell.

text.description: Free text field for customer use. Max 128 characters.

cl_order_id.description: Request identifier assigned by the client (Max 48 characters).

market.description: Market to place the order against.

price_tolerance.description: Order price tolerance in absolute terms.

qty.description: Order quantity. MUST be greater than zero.

side.description: The order side. Buy or Sell.

require_mfa.description: Enforce MFA logins across the organization.

display.description: The display name of the team.

cl_order_id.description: Request identifier assigned by the client (Max 48 characters).

qty.description: Order quantity. MUST be greater than zero.

cl_order_id.description: Request identifier assigned by the client (Max 48 characters).

qty.description: Order quantity. MUST be greater than zero.

require_mfa.description: Enforce MFA logins across the organization.

flags.description: Flags to indicate the capabilities of the strategy.

order_type.description: Order type for the strategy. e.g. Limit, Market

time_type.description: Time in force for the strategy.

name.description: The full name of the user.

picture.description: A https link to the users picture.

username.description: A default username for the user.
